title: (Bug) Sun Godess Karma
body: Sun Godess Karma has a bug on her Mantel. (Only on one side) When Karma walks the Mantel is attached to her back, when it should be flying, like on the other side. This bug appears to be only on Sun Godess Karma and not her classic skin. It would be nice if someone could fix it. Thanks!{{champion:43}} {{summoner:13}}

replies.body:
Hey, thanks for the report! This is called "weighting," and is a common thing we look for when QA'ing Skins! I'll send this over to the skins team. :)

{{champion:43}}
Report received! Looking into it now!
